thread.title: WATCH: 44-year-old goalkeeper saves PK, sends Egypt to Africa Cup of Nations final
thread.title_full: WATCH: 44-year-old goalkeeper saves PK, sends Egypt to Africa Cup of Nations final

author: Roger Gonzalez
title: WATCH: 44-year-old goalkeeper saves PK, sends Egypt to Africa Cup of Nations final
text:
10m ago • 1 min read 
Egypt is through to the Africa Cup of Nations final after beating Burkina Faso 4-3 in penalty kicks thanks to the heroics of 44-year-old goalkeeper Essam El-Hadary. 
After playing to a 1-1 draw in 120 minutes of regulation and extra time, Egypt led 4-3 in penalty kicks after Amr Warda scored his team's fifth attempt. 
So Bertrand Traore came up to try and keep things going for Burkina and push it into another round of penalty kicks, but instead this happened. El Hadary!! Egypt are in the final!! @ElHadary at 44, still writing headlines!! Watch LIVE: https://t.co/hX2FoduOuC https://t.co/UpMxnJCPCq — beIN SPORTS USA (@beINSPORTSUSA) February 1, 2017 
What a hero, and what a save with his hand as Egypt gets back to the final for the first time since 2010. You just have to love the passion and emotion El-Hadary shows after that massive save. 44-year-old Essam El-Hadary at the African Cup of Nations for Egypt:5 games
